properties.name: auto-mcp-server.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Auto MCP Server.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.endpoint
properties.description: The endpoint path for the MCP server.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.eager-init
properties.description: Whether to eagerly initialize the tool registry on startup.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.discovery.openapi-enabled
properties.description: Whether to discover endpoints from OpenAPI specifications.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.discovery.rest-enabled
properties.description: Whether to discover REST endpoints from Spring MVC controllers.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.discovery.graphql-enabled
properties.description: Whether to discover GraphQL queries and mutations.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.tools.include-patterns
properties.description: Ant-style patterns for endpoints to include as tools.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.tools.exclude-patterns
properties.description: Ant-style patterns for endpoints to exclude from tools.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.tools.max-tool-name-length
properties.description: Maximum length for generated tool names.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.tools.use-operation-id-as-tool-name
properties.description: Whether to use OpenAPI operationId as tool name when available.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.tools.approval-mode
properties.description: Tool approval mode: AUTO (all tools auto-approved), MANUAL (requires approval), or CONFIG_BASED (only from config file).

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.tools.auto-approve-patterns
properties.description: Ant-style patterns for tools to auto-approve in MANUAL mode.

properties.name: auto-mcp-server.tools.approval-config-file
properties.description: Path to YAML file containing pre-approved tools (e.g., classpath:approved-tools.yml).
